attributes.action: Disallow welfare benefits for wives in polygamus marriages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department of Work And Pensions has concluded that welfare benefits can be claimed for all wives in polygamus marriages.
We remind the government that polygamy is illegal in Britain and that allowing welfare benefits for several wives in one marriage is a misuse of taxpayers' money.
